info.name: NullJobs - Moderator
info.description:
This collection contains three endpoints for those users having a role of admin/moderator.

Actions they can perform:

1. View pending items (Endpoint: `/moderator-actions/list_pending_items/`)
    
2. Approve pending items (Endpoint: `/moderator-actions/approve_pending_items/`)
    
3. Delete pending items (Endpoint: `/moderator-actions/delete_pending_items/`)
    

Items are :

1. Job
2. Company
3. User (not implemented yet)
    

All three endpoints require a body where a user have to pass the value of key named "type", which refers to a type of object.

For example: if type = "job", then an endpoint will perform certain actions on Job related data.

"type" expects two values right now i.e., "job" and "company"

```
{
   "type": "job"
}

 ```

These two endpoints :

1. Approve Pending Items
2. Delete Pending Items
    

Expects the respective id of the object name given in the type i.e.,

if type == "job"

```
{
   "type": "job",
   "job_id": "xxxxxxxx"
}

 ```

if type == "company"

```
{
  "type": "company",
  "company_id": "xxxxxxxxx"
}

 ```

If the id key is not provided in the request, then an exception or error will be received in the response.
